name: @sleekcms/client
description: Official SleekCMS content client for Node 18+ and browser

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsup && cp README.md dist/ && cp .npmrc dist/ && jq '.private = false | .files = ["index.cjs", "index.mjs", "index.d.ts", "index.d.cts", "index.global.js", "index.global.js.map", "index.global.min.js", "index.global.min.js.map", "README.md"]' package.json > dist/package.json
